backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Event, Artist, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations, access-controlled endpoints for user profiles, artist tracking, radar events, and seed data initialization using Map/Set collections.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Techno Beacon app, loading the React entry point and setting the favicon and viewport meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Discover, Artists, Artist Detail, and My Radar pages, wrapped in a Layout component containing Navigation, footer, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
Admin-only button component that triggers backend seed data initialization via a mutation, showing pending/success/error states with toast notifications and an admin badge.
frontend/src/components/ArtistCard.tsx: Artist card component displaying image, name, genre, and event count with a follow/unfollow toggle button and click handler that opens an ArtistEventPopup or navigates to the artist detail page.
frontend/src/components/ArtistEventPopup: A popup component that displays events for a specific artist, allowing authenticated users to add/remove events from their radar and open a trip planner modal.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: A card component for displaying a single event with date, location, and source info, supporting radar toggle and trip planner functionality for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/EventFilters.tsx: A filter bar component with inputs for artist name, city, and date range, displaying active filter badges and a clear button when filters are applied.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A centered prompt component that displays a login button for unauthenticated users, with customizable title and message props.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with links to Discover, Artists, and My Radar pages, plus login/logout controls and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name to create a profile, blocking interaction until the form is submitted.
frontend/src/components/SourceBadge.tsx: A small badge component that displays the event data source (e.g., RA, Bandsintown) with color-coded styling per source.
frontend/src/components/TripPlannerModal: A modal dialog component that helps users plan travel to a concert event by entering a home city, selecting a budget level, and generating Skyscanner flight and Booking.com hotel links with pre-filled dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including events, artists, user profiles, and tracked artists, all gated on actor and identity availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Space Grotesk and Space Mono fonts, defines a dark industrial techno theme with OKLCH CSS variables and neon amber/green accent tokens, and adds utility classes for glow effects and animations.
frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts: Defines a static lookup table mapping composite keys of artistId and dateTime nanoseconds to backend event IDs, and exports a helper function to retrieve an event's backend ID from that map.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single artist's profile (image, name, genre) and their upcoming events, with loading skeletons, error handling with retry, and defensive filtering of stale event data.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists with a search filter, per-artist event counts, and tracked-artist state, showing error/loading states and an admin init button when needed.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Main event discovery page with a hero banner, artist/city/date filters, and a sorted, sanitised list of upcoming events fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/MyRadarPage.tsx: Authenticated user's personal radar page showing saved/tracked artist events with ticket links to Dice and Songkick, plus error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a pulsing radio icon and a link back to the home route.
frontend/src/utils/ticketSearch.ts: Utility that builds search URLs for the Dice or Songkick ticket platforms given an artist name.
frontend/src/utils/travelLinks.ts: Provides city-to-IATA airport code mapping and helper functions to generate Skyscanner and Booking.com travel links from event city names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including neon color palette, box shadows, fonts (Space Grotesk/Mono), and keyframe animations for a dark techno-aesthetic UI.
project_state.json: Project state document for Techno Beacon app describing its architecture, existing features, and known issuesâ€”primarily around artist/event seed data not loading correctly in the backend.
